title: Dr Mob's Art Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
+ **{{ALL DATES ARE IN "DAY/MONTH/YEAR" FORMAT}}**
+ **__DISCLAIMER__**
> The artworks below are traces of the original images found in their designated articles. I have traced them in Microsoft Word and put my own personal twist on them to make them somewhat different from their original counterparts. I do not wish to steal anyone's work as tracing is my personal style and if the creator of the original photo would like me to take my traced counterpart I will do so without further issue. I only want to contribute to the wiki with my art as anyone else would and I haven't been making any profit off my artworks. 
> I apologise for any inconvenience that may arise from this page
> - Dr Mobulous
